content: NPR PS MP Pipe press jaw Press jaws for thick-walled profile press fittings up to 1. Compatible with Hilti NPR 32-A pipe press tools. ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Inserts for pressing, crimping & cutting ### FEATURES:Features Press jaws designed for for MegaPress® profile press fittings made by Viega® for up to 1 Press jaws designed for for PowerPress® profile press fittings made by VSH® for up to 1 Press jaws designed for for PowerPress® profile press fittings made by Apollo® for up to 1 Equipped with NFC tag for easier identification and management via the Hilti Connect app and ON!Track tool tracking software Applications Pressing thick-walled carbon steel pipes from 1/2 to 1* Pressing thick-walled stainless steel pipes from 1/2 to 1* *These values are system dependent. In order to ensure correct and safe pressing consult the original instructions manual from the system supplier. ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2294849 - Press jaws NPR PS MP 1 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PS MP 1 Press jaws - 2294847 - Press jaws NPR PS MP 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PS MP 1/2 Press jaws - 2294848 - Press jaws NPR PS MP 3/4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PS MP 3/4 Press jaws
